properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 6:19PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...West to southwest wind of 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to
60 mph. The higher gusts will be from Clark to south of Clark.

* WHERE...The Cody and Clark areas.

* WHEN...Now through New Year's Day.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be difficult on Highway 120,
especially for high profile vehicles. Strong cross winds will
enhance the blowover risk for lightweight and high profile
vehicles, including camping trailers.

NWSheadline: Strong Gusty Winds through New Year's Day
